patterns: My mousepad is defective how do I return?
how long do i have to return if something is wrong?
response: you can return your product within 30 days of recieving it, it must be sent back in its original packeging. To read more please visit https://onipads.com/apps/frequently-asked-questions?faq-section-id=67634&faq-article-id=304056

your product may be returned within 30 days of purchase, please be in contact with our customer service team you can reach them servicesonipads@gmail.com. A representative will contact you within 1 business day
